institution: Human Resources Development Service of Korea
category: Internal human resource development support project operation rules/Article 6 (Composition and operation of review committee)
contents: Article 6 (Composition and operation of the review committee) ① The review committee pursuant to Article 4 (1) of the Vocational Competency Development Regulations and Article 11 of the Certification Regulations shall be formed in consideration of the characteristics of each business and the quantity of review/evaluation targets, etc., ② Reviewers In accordance with the “Guidelines for Management of Vocational Competency Development Experts,” appoints experts with abundant experience and knowledge from academia and industry related to human resource development. However, considering the characteristics of each project, public officials from government-related ministries, internal employees, etc. may be included as members. ③ In cases where continuous operation is necessary for a certain period of time in operating the review committee, members may be appointed with a fixed term of office., ④ In cases where decision-making is necessary, such as determining the direction of project review and evaluation, preparing a result report, or restricting participation in cases of misconduct, etc., a chairperson may be appointed. ⑤ If a decision is necessary pursuant to paragraph 4, the attendance of the majority of members is required. The decision is made with the approval of a majority of the members present., ⑥ The review committee performs one of the following matters: 1. Review of selection of support targets such as business owners and operating institutions for human resource development support projects, 2. Human resource development support project Performance evaluation of implementation results, 3. Accounting settlement evaluation of the business budget execution of the human resource development support project, 4. Review of restrictions such as fraud in the human resource development support project, 5. Other matters deemed necessary by the chairman of the board, ⑦ When forming a subcommittee for the efficient operation of the review committee, the chairman may operate it as a review panel or evaluation group depending on the nature of the business, and matters regarding the operation of the subcommittee, etc. shall be separately determined by the chairman. ⑧ In relation to the operation of the review committee, this For matters not specified in the rules, the “Committee Operation Standard Rules” shall apply mutatis mutandis.
